name: Family Service and Guidance Center of Topeka, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Family Service and Guidance Center of Topeka, Inc. is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Topeka, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $17.6M in Medicaid payments across 138K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $17.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
